MSMLogin

Extend an Ext.FormPanel, enable insert of username and password to access to resources of MapStoreManager and abilitate edit and delete map

Inherits from

  • <Ext.FormPanel>
Summary
MSMLoginExtend an Ext.FormPanel, enable insert of username and password to access to resources of MapStoreManager and abilitate edit and delete map
Properties
loginText{string} string for label in login button
logoutText{string} string for label in logout button
ruleText{string} string with template to display user and its role
loginErrorText{string} string to visualize if user enter invalid username and password
loginErrorTitle{string} title of form alert to visualize if user enter invalid username and password
userFieldText{string} label for user in a form
passwordFieldText{string} label for password in a form
loginFormTitle{string} title of login form
grid{object} property grid to access GridPanel
config{object} object for configuring the component.
labelWidth{number} set width of label
frame{boolean} set frame properties to true
defaultType{string} set default type of form as testfield

Properties

loginText

{string} string for label in login button

logoutText

{string} string for label in logout button

ruleText

{string} string with template to display user and its role

loginErrorText

{string} string to visualize if user enter invalid username and password

loginErrorTitle

{string} title of form alert to visualize if user enter invalid username and password

userFieldText

{string} label for user in a form

passwordFieldText

{string} label for password in a form

loginFormTitle

{string} title of login form

grid

{object} property grid to access GridPanel

config

{object} object for configuring the component.  See config.js

labelWidth

{number} set width of label

frame

{boolean} set frame properties to true

defaultType

{string} set default type of form as testfield
